item.title: Traffic Alert Collision Avoidance System (TCAS II) – Traffic Alert (TA) Display System(s) – CDTI TCAS Display (STC ST01103SE) (EFB Not Installed)

numlitem.para: RA visual display and audio functions are operative, and
En route or approach procedures do not require its use.
Monitor operative indications and respond accordingly.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to Center Pedestal TCAS Display "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: Refer to MEL 34-58-1-2 for additional display relief.
